desc_content.paragraph: Main data structure representing a .blend file and all its data-blocks
Have recent edits been saved to disk
Has the current session been saved to disk as a .blend file
Automatically pack all external data into .blend file
Version of Blender the .blend was saved with

field_body.paragraph: int array of 3 items in [0, inf], default (0, 0, 0), (readonly)
The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.

desc_content.paragraph: Returns a mapping of all ID datablocks in current bpy.data to a set of all datablocks using them.
For list of valid set members for key_types & value_types, see: bpy.types.KeyingSetPath.id_type.

list_item.paragraph: subset (sequence) – When passed, only these data-blocks and their users will be included as keys/values in the map.
key_types (set of strings) – Filter the keys mapped by ID types.
value_types (set of strings) – Filter the values in the set by ID types.

field_body.paragraph: dictionary of bpy.types.ID instances, with sets of ID’s as their values.
